message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to start with an offer of $12000. Is this something you'd be interested in?
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
I understand that $9000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you a price of $11000. Is this something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit too high on the price. I'd be willing to consider $9500. Can you do any better than that?
I'm getting closer to your price, Bob, but I still need to make a profit. I can offer you a price of $10500. Is this something you'd be willing to consider?
I'm getting close to the price I'm willing to pay, Alice. I'd be willing to consider $9200. Can you meet me at this price?
I'm not quite there yet, Bob, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer you a price of $10000. Is this something you'd be willing to consider?
I'm really close now, Alice. I'd be willing to consider $9500. Can you meet me at this price?
